description:
dark wood; heavily ornamented throughout with gold inlay engraving; ornamentation consists of mythical figures and creatures, flowers and organic forms; gold inlay also on butt, trigger housing and trigger guard; gold seal with apple and "MAN/DAR/INO" to L of trigger. 
Arms and Armor-Firearm
medium: European walnut, iron, steel, parcel gilt, gold
title: Paris-style (1660s) Flintlock Fowler
